data.name: Suspicious eMail
data.demo_message: Sends a Phishing email to a local user

body.html:
All,
A Critical vulnerability has been found in our internal ERP client application
, a patch has been made available in our internal website
Windows Patch
. it is mandatory for all employes to download it and install it immediately.
Office of the CTO
.

headers.subject: Important patch deployment notification

headers.received-spf: Pass (protection.outlook.com: domain of fortinet.com designates {{TR_MALICIOUS_IP}} as permitted sender) receiver=protection.outlook.com; client-ip={{TR_MALICIOUS_IP}}; helo=smtp.fortinet.com;
